w3af-run.w3af-version: w3af - Web Application Attack and Audit Framework Version: 1.7.6 Revision: unknown Distribution: Kali Linux Rolling Branch: unknown Local changes: No Author: Andres Riancho and the w3af team.

vulnerability.name: Server header
vulnerability.description: The server header for the remote web server is: "nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)".

http-response.body:
• 首页
    • 关于
    • 服务
    • 行业
    • 招聘
    • 联系

    我们的服务

    根植于互联网，搭建软件研发+硬件支持+增值服务体系。

    业务咨询
    产品设计
    软件研发
    营销推广
    硬件代理

    我们的优势

    以人为本，用专业、创新、高效、极致的服务驱动价值。

    专业团队

    团队核心成员来自金融、媒体、互联网知名企业，拥有扎实的背景和丰富的经验。

    创新驱动

    用创意点亮产品，用技术驱动创新，助力合作伙伴永远快“人”一步。

    高效执行

    对市场发展、行业变化、客户反馈时刻保持高度敏感，快速反应并高效执行。

    追求极致

    精益求精、追求极致是企业的灵魂，我们愿与伙伴在合作中享受共同成长的乐趣。

    我们的行业

    我们深耕金融、媒体行业，力求以专业化的服务和产品为客户带来价值。

    关于我们

    我们崇尚工匠精神，用匠心与时代沟通。

    北京易云时代信息技术有限公司成立于2007年，是以自主研发为主，系统集成为辅的，专注于为金融、媒体行业提供专业化、定制化的互联网解决方案的高技术服务公司。自成立之初公司即确立了以技术创新为根基，以“为客户创造价值，为企业创造效益，为员工创造机会”为核心的经营理念。秉承“专业定制，品质服务，极致安全”的服务宗旨，经过多年的发展，易云时代逐步形成了“软件+硬件+服务”的业务体系，并致力于为合作伙伴提供包括咨询服务、软件研发、系统集成、运营管理、营销推广在内的行业+互联网整体解决方案。

vulnerability.name: DAV incorrect configuration
vulnerability.description: DAV seems to be correctly configured and allowing you to use the PUT method but the directory does not have the right permissions that would allow the web server to write to it. This error was found at: "http://ecloudtime.com/BzMiY".

http-response.body:
HTTP Status 403 -

type Status report

message

description Access to the specified resource has been forbidden.

Apache Tomcat/7.0.68 (Ubuntu)

HTTP Status 404 - /BzMiY

type Status report

message /BzMiY

description The requested resource is not available.

Apache Tomcat/7.0.68 (Ubuntu)

vulnerability.name: No DNS wildcard
vulnerability.description: The target site has NO DNS wildcard, and the contents of "http://foobar.ecloudtime.com/" differ from the contents of "http://ecloudtime.com/".

http-response.body:
Welcome to nginx!

If you see this page, the nginx web server is successfully installed and working. Further configuration is required.

For online documentation and support please refer to nginx.org.
Commercial support is available at nginx.com.

Thank you for using nginx.

vulnerability.name: DAV methods enabled
vulnerability.description: The URL "http://ecloudtime.com/" has the following allowed methods. These include DAV methods and should be disabled: *, DELETE, GET, HEAD, OPTIONS, POST, PUT

header.content: GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

    团队核心成员来自金融、媒体、互联网知名企业，拥有扎实的背景和丰富的经验。

    创新驱动

    高效执行

    追求极致

    精益求精、追求极致是企业的灵魂，我们愿与伙伴在合作中享受共同成长的乐趣。

    关于我们

    我们崇尚工匠精神，用匠心与时代沟通。

    北京易云时代信息技术有限公司成立于2007年，是以自主研发为主，系统集成为辅的，专注于为金融、媒体行业提供专业化、定制化的互联网解决方案的高技术服务公司。自成立之初公司即确立了以技术创新为根基，以“为客户创造价值，为企业创造效益，为员工创造机会”为核心的经营理念。秉承“专业定制，品质服务，极致安全”的服务宗旨，经过多年的发展，易云时代逐步形成了“软件+硬件+服务”的业务体系，并致力于为合作伙伴提供包括咨询服务、软件研发、系统集成、运营管理、营销推广在内的行业+互联网整体解决方案。

vulnerability.name: Click-Jacking vulnerability
vulnerability.description: The whole target has no protection (X-Frame-Options header) against Click-Jacking attacks
vulnerability.long-description:
Clickjacking (User Interface redress attack, UI redress attack, UI redressing) is a malicious technique of tricking a Web user into clicking on something different from what the user perceives they are clicking on, thus potentially revealing confidential information or taking control of their computer while clicking on seemingly innocuous web pages.
The server didn't return an `X-Frame-Options` header which means that this website could be at risk of a clickjacking attack. The `X-Frame-Options` HTTP response header can be used to indicate whether or not a browser should be allowed to render a page inside a frame or iframe. Sites can use this to avoid clickjacking attacks, by ensuring that their content is not embedded into other sites.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Configure your web server to include an X-Frame-Options header.
